caption: Two men are in a room and talking while their fingers are on a book. Then a woman goes in and says something to them. Then two persons convey two boxes of books into the room and the two men start to find something in the boxes. They take all the books out and open the books. It seems like that they are trying to find some key information in the books. They keep searching for a long time but fail. They work until morning, then one of them goes to work, but he falls asleep in his working place. Then they go to see a performance.
